snippet: GOULD--Julian. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Julian Gould, father of Larry Gould, who leaves behind a loving family to carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Larry and Michele; their children; their grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: GOULD--Julian. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Julian Gould, father of Larry Gould, who leaves behind a loving family to carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Larry and Michele; their children; their grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
